021
022import java.util.UUID;
023
024/**
025 * Represents a class that provides translation services.
026 *
027 * @author creatorfromhell
028 * @since 0.1.2.0
029 */
030public interface TranslationProvider {
031
032  /**
033   * Used to get the language of a player with the associated identifier.
034   *
035   * @param identifier The identifier of the player.
036   *
037   * @return The language that should be used for this player.
038   */
039  String getLang(final UUID identifier);
040
041  /**
042   * Used to translate a node for the given language. This should resort to the default if the
043   * specified language doesn't exist.
044   *
045   * @param messageData The message data to utilize for this translation.
046   * @param language    The language to translate the node to.
047   *
048   * @return The translated message represented by the node, or the default for if the node doesn't
049   * exist.
050   */
051  String translateNode(final MessageData messageData, final String language);
052
053  /**
054   * Used to translate a node for the given language for the given player. This should resort to the
055   * default if the specified language doesn't exist.
056   *
057   * @param identifier  The identifier of the given player.
058   * @param messageData The message data to utilize for this translation.
059   *
060   * @return The translated message represented by the node, or the default for if the node doesn't
061   * exist.
062   */
063  default String translate(final UUID identifier, final MessageData messageData) {
064
065    return translateNode(messageData, getLang(identifier));
066  }
067}
